title: Variable Max Auto Step
description: Entities with this component will have a maximum auto step height that is different depending on wether they are on a block that prevents jumping. Incompatible with "runtime_identifier": "minecraft:horse".

base_value.title: Base Value
base_value.description: The maximum auto step height when on any other block.

controlled_value.title: Controlled Value
controlled_value.description: The maximum auto step height when on any other block and controlled by the player.

jump_prevented_value.title: Jump Prevented Value
jump_prevented_value.description: The maximum auto step height when on a block that prevents jumping.
